alert.note: Alert for Boise Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 4:40PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Ada, southwestern Boise and west central Elmore Counties through 515 PM MDT... At 438 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking an outflow boundary and strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Aldape Summit to near Lucky Peak Reservoir to 6 miles southwest of Danskin Peak. Movement was west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Lucky Peak Spring Shores Marina, Aldape Summit, Arrowrock Dam and Lucky Peak Reservoir around 440 PM MDT. Lucky Peak Dam around 450 PM MDT. Boise, Garden City, Eagle and Hidden Springs around 510 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
